content: adorn your festival garb with this cute crochet mushroom ornament stitched in bernat super value you ll work in rounds doing simple single_crochet to make your woodland-inspired fungi choose any colors you like or keep it classic for all to admire it s a creative way to add a personal touch to your imaginative costume materials bernat® super value™ 7 oz/197 g 440 yds/402 m contrast a cherry red 53436 1 ball or 33 yds/30 m contrast b natural 07414 1 ball or 22 yds/20 m measurements approx 4 10 cm high x 3 7 5 cm diameter
